text: la ykhyfhm alhwl aleazim yawm alqyamt, bal tbshrhm almlaykt: hdha yawmukum aladhi wueidtum fih alkramt min allah wjzyl althwab. yawm natwi alsama' kama tutwa alsahifat ealaa ma kutb fyha, wnbeth fih alkhalq ealaa hayyat khalqna lahum 'awal marat kama wldthm amhathm, dhlk waead allah aladhi la ytkhllaf, waeadna bdhlk wedana hqana elyna, 'iinaa kunaa faeilin daymana ma naeid bh
